title: JSON schema for Azure Functions function.json files

___useMonitor.description: When true, schedule will be persisted to aid in maintaining the correct schedule even through restarts. Defaults to true for schedules with interval >= 1 minute.

___schedule.description: A CRON expression representing the timer schedule.

___runOnStartup.description: When true, your timer function will be invoked immediately after a runtime restart and on-schedule thereafter.

___cardinality.description: The cardinality hint for the input binding parameter (single message or array of messages).

___connection.description: The event hub connection string setting.
An app setting (or environment variable) with the storage connection string to be used by this binding.

___path.description: The path to the blob container

___accessRights.description: The permission level of the service bus connection string used by this binding.

___connection.description: An app setting (or environment variable) with the service bus connection string to be used by this binding.

___topicName.description: The service bus topic to monitor (if using a queue)

___queueName.description: The service bus queue to monitor (if using a queue)

___filter.description: A filter expression to be applied when retrieving rows.

___take.description: The number or records to retrieve.

___connection.description: An app setting (or environment variable) with the storage connection string to be used by this binding.

___tableName.description: The name of the storage table.

___authToken.description: The name of the app setting which contains your Twilio authentication token.

___body.description: Optional body of SMS text message.

___accountSid.description: The name of the app setting which contains your Twilio Account Sid.

___to.description: The phone number the SMS text is sent to.

___from.description: The phone number the SMS text is sent from.

___webHookType.description: The type of WebHook handled by the trigger (if handling a pre-defined WebHook).

___connection.description: An app setting (or environment variable) with the storage connection string to be used by this binding.

___sqlQuery.description: This is the query to run against the collection.

___id.description: This is the id for the record to retrieve.

___createIfNotExists.description: When true, your database and collection will be created automatically.

___connection.description: This is the connection string for your DocumentDB account.

___collectionName.description: This is the name of the collection within your database to which data will be written.

___databaseName.description: This is the name of the database within your DocumentDB account to which data will be written.

___apiKey.description: The name of the app setting which contains your SendGrid api key.

___to.description: The email address to send to.

___from.description: The email address to send from.

___dataType.description: The data type hint for the binding parameter (string, binary, or stream).

___platform.description: The notification platform to target. Sends template notification if platform is omitted.

___connection.description: The name of the app setting which contains the notification hub connection string.

___tagExpression.description: The tag to send the notification to.

___hubName.description: The name of the notification hub.

___id.description: This is the id for the record to retrieve.

___apiKey.description: This is app setting name that specifies the API Key for your Mobile App.

___connection.description: This is the app setting name that specifies the URL of your Mobile App.

___tableName.description: This is the name of the table within your Mobile App to which data will be written.

___dataType.description: The data type hint for the binding parameter (string, binary, or stream).

___accessRights.description: The permission level of the service bus connection string used by this binding.

___connection.description: An app setting (or environment variable) with the service bus connection string to be used by this binding.

___topicName.description: The service bus topic to monitor (if using a queue)

___queueName.description: The service bus queue to monitor (if using a queue)

___connection.description: An app setting (or environment variable) with the storage connection string to be used by this binding.

___path.description: The path to the blob container

___cardinality.description: The cardinality hint for the input binding parameter (single message or array of messages).

___connection.description: The event hub connection string setting.

___useMonitor.description: When true, schedule will be persisted to aid in maintaining the correct schedule even through restarts. Defaults to true for schedules with interval >= 1 minute.

___schedule.description: A CRON expression representing the timer schedule.

___runOnStartup.description: When true, your timer function will be invoked immediately after a runtime restart and on-schedule thereafter.

___connection.description: An app setting (or environment variable) with the storage connection string to be used by this binding.

___webHookType.description: The type of WebHook handled by the trigger (if handling a pre-defined WebHook).

___id.description: This is the id for the record to retrieve.

___apiKey.description: This is app setting name that specifies the API Key for your Mobile App.

___connection.description: This is the app setting name that specifies the URL of your Mobile App.

___tableName.description: This is the name of the table within your Mobile App to which data will be written.

___sqlQuery.description: This is the query to run against the collection.

___id.description: This is the id for the record to retrieve.

___createIfNotExists.description: When true, your database and collection will be created automatically.

___connection.description: This is the connection string for your DocumentDB account.

___collectionName.description: This is the name of the collection within your database to which data will be written.

___databaseName.description: This is the name of the database within your DocumentDB account to which data will be written.

___filter.description: A filter expression to be applied when retrieving rows.

___take.description: The number or records to retrieve.

___connection.description: An app setting (or environment variable) with the storage connection string to be used by this binding.

___tableName.description: The name of the storage table.

___platform.description: The notification platform to target. Sends template notification if platform is omitted.

___connection.description: The name of the app setting which contains the notification hub connection string.

___tagExpression.description: The tag to send the notification to.

___hubName.description: The name of the notification hub.

___authToken.description: The name of the app setting which contains your Twilio authentication token.

___body.description: Optional body of SMS text message.

___accountSid.description: The name of the app setting which contains your Twilio Account Sid.

___to.description: The phone number the SMS text is sent to.

___from.description: The phone number the SMS text is sent from.

___apiKey.description: The name of the app setting which contains your SendGrid api key.

___to.description: The email address to send to.

___from.description: The email address to send from.

___disabled.description: If set to true, marks the function as disabled (it cannot be triggered).

___configurationSource.description: For C# precompiled functions only. If set to 'attributes', use WebJobs attributes to specify bindings. Otherwise, use the 'bindings' property of this function.json.

___scriptFile.description: Optional path to function script file.

___excluded.description: If set to true, the function will not be loaded, compiled, or triggered.
